targets.rawSql:
WITH a AS (
SELECT
geom, gbifid,
COUNT(gbifid) OVER() AS cnt
FROM explore.gbif
LEFT JOIN explore.recordedby ON gbif.recordedby_id = recordedby.id
LEFT JOIN explore.multimedia b USING (gbifid)
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventdate)
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), geom)
AND (tsv @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$search') OR NULLIF('$search', '') IS null)
AND (tsv_recordedby @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$recordedby') OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
--AND (recordedby.name % '$recordedby' OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
AND (tsv_scientificname @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$scientificname') OR NULLIF('$scientificname', '') IS null)
AND (preparations IN ($preparations) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($preparations)), '') IS null)
AND (b.type IN ($multimedia) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($multimedia)), '') IS null)
), b AS (
SELECT
geom, gbifid,
ST_ClusterKMeans(geom, LEAST(cnt::integer, 100)) OVER() AS clusters
FROM a
)
SELECT clusters,
COUNT(DISTINCT gbifid) AS tooltip,
AVG(ST_Y (ST_Transform (geom, 4326))) AS latitude,
AVG(ST_X (ST_Transform (geom, 4326))) AS longitude
FROM b
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

WITH a AS (
SELECT
geom,
COUNT(gbifid) OVER() AS cnt
FROM explore.gbif
LEFT JOIN explore.recordedby ON gbif.recordedby_id = recordedby.id
LEFT JOIN explore.multimedia b USING (gbifid)
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventdate)
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), geom)
AND (tsv @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$search') OR NULLIF('$search', '') IS null)
AND (tsv_recordedby @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$recordedby') OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
--AND (recordedby.name % '$recordedby' OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
AND (tsv_scientificname @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$scientificname') OR NULLIF('$scientificname', '') IS null)
AND (preparations IN ($preparations) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($preparations)), '') IS null)
AND (b.type IN ($multimedia) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($multimedia)), '') IS null)
), b AS (
SELECT
geom,
ST_ClusterKMeans(geom, LEAST(cnt::integer, 100)) OVER() AS clusters
FROM a
)
SELECT
clusters,
COUNT(clusters) AS tooltip,
AVG(ST_Y (ST_Transform (geom, 4326))) AS latitude,
AVG(ST_X (ST_Transform (geom, 4326))) AS longitude
FROM b
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY 1;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT gbifid), 
  $__time(eventdate)
FROM explore.gbif
LEFT JOIN explore.recordedby ON gbif.recordedby_id = recordedby.id
LEFT JOIN explore.multimedia b USING (gbifid)
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventdate)
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), geom)
AND (tsv @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$search') OR NULLIF('$search', '') IS null)
AND (tsv_recordedby @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$recordedby') OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
--AND (recordedby.name % '$recordedby' OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
AND (tsv_scientificname @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$scientificname') OR NULLIF('$scientificname', '') IS null)
AND (preparations IN ($preparations) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($preparations)), '') IS null)
AND (b.type IN ($multimedia) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($multimedia)), '') IS null)
GROUP BY 2
--ORDER BY 2 ASC

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT gbifid), recordedby
FROM explore.gbif
LEFT JOIN explore.recordedby ON gbif.recordedby_id = recordedby.id
LEFT JOIN explore.multimedia b USING (gbifid)
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventdate)
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), geom)
AND (tsv @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$search') OR NULLIF('$search', '') IS null)
AND (tsv_recordedby @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$recordedby') OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
--AND (recordedby.name % '$recordedby' OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
AND (tsv_scientificname @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$scientificname') OR NULLIF('$scientificname', '') IS null)
AND (preparations IN ($preparations) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($preparations)), '') IS null)
AND (b.type IN ($multimedia) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($multimedia)), '') IS null)
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT gbifid), scientificname
FROM explore.gbif
LEFT JOIN explore.recordedby ON gbif.recordedby_id = recordedby.id
LEFT JOIN explore.multimedia b USING (gbifid)
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventdate)
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), geom)
AND (tsv @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$search') OR NULLIF('$search', '') IS null)
AND (tsv_recordedby @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$recordedby') OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
--AND (recordedby.name % '$recordedby' OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
AND (tsv_scientificname @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$scientificname') OR NULLIF('$scientificname', '') IS null)
AND (preparations IN ($preparations) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($preparations)), '') IS null)
AND (b.type IN ($multimedia) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($multimedia)), '') IS null)
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT gbifid), preparations
FROM explore.gbif
LEFT JOIN explore.recordedby ON gbif.recordedby_id = recordedby.id
LEFT JOIN explore.multimedia b USING (gbifid)
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventdate)
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), geom)
AND (tsv @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$search') OR NULLIF('$search', '') IS null)
AND (tsv_recordedby @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$recordedby') OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
--AND (recordedby.name % '$recordedby' OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
AND (tsv_scientificname @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$scientificname') OR NULLIF('$scientificname', '') IS null)
AND (preparations IN ($preparations) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($preparations)), '') IS null)
AND (b.type IN ($multimedia) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($multimedia)), '') IS null)
GROUP BY 2
ORDER BY 1 DESC
LIMIT 10

SELECT a.gbifid, a.eventdate, a.scientificname, a.catalognumber, a.occurrenceid, a.recordedby, a.preparations, a.locality, 
(array_agg(b.identifier))[1] AS image, to_jsonb(array_agg(b.identifier)) AS image_urls
FROM explore.gbif a
LEFT JOIN explore.recordedby ON a.recordedby_id = recordedby.id
LEFT JOIN explore.multimedia b USING (gbifid)
WHERE $__timeFilter(eventdate)
AND ST_Contains(st_geometryfromtext('POLYGON(($maxLon $minLat, $maxLon $maxLat, $minLon $maxLat, $minLon $minLat,$maxLon $minLat))',4326), geom)
AND (tsv @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$search') OR NULLIF('$search', '') IS null)
AND (tsv_recordedby @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$recordedby') OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
--AND (recordedby.name % '$recordedby' OR NULLIF('$recordedby', '') IS null)
AND (tsv_scientificname @@ websearch_to_tsquery('simple', '$scientificname') OR NULLIF('$scientificname', '') IS null)
AND (preparations IN ($preparations) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($preparations)), '') IS null)
AND (b.type IN ($multimedia) OR NULLIF(TRIM(CONCAT($multimedia)), '') IS null)
GROUP BY 1
ORDER BY eventdate DESC
LIMIT 100
